ygData.subject: Re: Jeweler Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Bahir, I m also new to the list, but I might be able to help a bit with the jewlrey questions.  More feedback is welcome :) You can add more points into
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Bahir,

I'm also new to the list, but I might be able to help a bit with the jewlrey
questions. More feedback is welcome :)

You can add more points into your Jewlrey Craft skill after the base 21 points,
but they'll cost you. The skills list will show how much it will cost to
increase the skill (given you have points to spend on them). I personally
prefer to increase my jewlrey skill by practicing making jewlrey instead of
spending the money on skill points. That would be the reason I don't add more
points to jewlrey anymore. My skill is still low (only at 35), but actually
making the jewlrey gives for getting the money you put into the skill back,
instead of spending the money for the points, and not seeing the money back..
Also, as an enchanter, money for making the jewlrey (or anything else for that
matter :) ) isn't too hard to come by if you're patient. We are the only
class that can complete the Stein of Mogguk quest easily, and the Stein is
worth quite a bit of money, (I just sold mine for 250pp). I've run this quest
twice now, and I'm planning on doing it a few more times.

I'm not sure about the research question as I am only level 12 right now, but I
have saved some of my practice points for research. My question is this:
Where do I find the pages for the research? after days of hunting the
dervishes in North Ro I picked up one page (24 of Tasarin's left side). Are
there any other places I might be able to pick these up quicker?

Ezrae
Dark Elf Enchantress of the 12th season
Brell Serilis



Rich Hitz wrote:

> From: Rich Hitz <Rich.Hitz@...>
>
> Hello all.
>
> I am new to the list and have Jeweling questions for you.
> My questions involves training points.
> After you spend the max 21 points at the guild and you get to your next
> level can you put those 5 into your Jewel Craft skill? Can you do this at
> each level?
> I realize you may not want to do this or advise it, but is it possible?
>
> What reasons would you give for NOT putting your training points into Jewel
> Craft at each level, even if you only put in 1 or 2.
>
> Also, after you reach 16th, how hard is it to do research and advance it?
> Should I save points for Specialization?
>
> Thanks.
>
> --
> Bahir
> 3rd Season DE Enchanter
> Bertoxx
>
>
